name: Notion
description: Workspace for notes, docs, and lightweight databases. Great for personal knowledge bases.

name: GitHub
description: Code hosting with issues, pull requests, and CI/CD integrations.

name: DrawIO
description: Free diagramming tool for creating flowcharts and visual diagrams. Recommended for creating network topologies.

name: Google Translate
description: Free translator for text, speech, images, and entire web pages across 100+ languages; includes pronunciation and a phrasebook. Not the most accurate but highly versetile.

name: DeepL
description: Neural-network translator known for high-quality results; supports document translation, custom glossaries, and tone options.

name: Sejda PDF Editor
description: Online PDF editor to edit text and images, annotate and sign, and quickly merge/split/compress files; auto-deletes uploads for privacy.

name: Smallpdf
description: Suite of PDF tools to compress, convert (PDF ↔ Word/Excel/PPT), edit, e-sign, merge/split, and protect files; available on web and desktop.

name: RegExr
description: Interactive regular expression editor with real-time highlighting and explanations, a built-in cheatsheet, and a community pattern library; test text and share links.

name: TextMechanic
description: Collection of bulk text tools: find/replace, remove duplicates, sort lines, add/remove line breaks, case convert, trim/clean, and more.

name: ToHTML
description: Online converters for text and code: text→HTML, HTML→text, code→HTML with syntax highlighting, and CSV/JSON→HTML tables; includes HTML encoder/decoder.

name: VirusTotal
description: Multi-engine scanner for files, URLs, and hashes; checks against dozens of AV engines and sandboxes, with detection details, behavior analysis, and community reports.
note: "Please take care to not publish personal information"~ Tim

name: Squoosh
description: Browser-based image compressor and converter with side-by-side preview; supports AVIF, WebP, MozJPEG, and OxiPNG, adjustable quality/resize, and works offline as a PWA.

name: SS64
description: Command-line reference and examples for Windows CMD, PowerShell, Bash, and macOS; concise syntax, switches, and scripting notes.

name: PDF24
description: Suite of PDF tools to create, merge/split, compress, convert, edit/annotate, OCR scans, and e-sign; available online and as a free Windows desktop app with on-device processing.

name: Visual Studio Code
description: Free, extensible code editor for Windows, macOS, and Linux; built-in IntelliSense, debugging, Git integration, terminal, and a rich extensions marketplace (Remote/WSL/Containers supported).

name: Wikipedia
description: Free, multilingual encyclopedia written collaboratively by volunteers; a broad reference with citations, summaries, and links to primary sources.
note: "Make sure to check your sources!"~ Tim
